name: Harvest Moment
description:
It is the time to harvest forest goodies. Let’s help cute animals gather fruits to celebrate this joyful moment!

Harvest Moment is an arcade style game to aim and shoot greedy birds. Once greedy birds are hit, fruits will directly fall to the ground, so the goal is to make sure that fruits will fall right into the animals’ baskets before hitting ground.

Collect fruits as many as you can to unlock additional animals and let them liven up this harvest party together!

More information on: https://www.seinus-inc.com/harvestmoment

Illustration: Robert Brooks, いらすとや
Music: カワサキヤスヒロ, スエノブ, もっぴーさうんど, 甘茶
